item.title: Brandon Harvey, Los Angeles, CA
item.description: magnopus :: product engineering As a Director of Engineering for Product at Magnopus (2020-present), I’ve built the US side of the companyâ€™s first product engineering team, both organically and by hiring. Starting in the middle of the pandemic, we’ve created an effective new software delivery organization not just by applying best practices in engineering, but by creating effective interdisciplinary workflows across product, design, “designgineering”, and QA that allow teams to move quickly, learn quickly, and still deliver with rigorous quality.
